sentences.en: A free radical is a molecular fragment having an unpaired electron.
sentences.cn: 自由基是一种具有未配对电子的分子碎体.

sentences.en: As they remove each segment, they analyze its molecular sequence.
sentences.cn: 在除去每一片段时, 他们分析了片段的分子顺序.

sentences.en: At any given instant the distribution of molecular speeds is always constant under the same conditions.
sentences.cn: 在相同的条件下,分子速度分布在任何时候都是恒定的.

sentences.en: For the pressure to become zero , molecular bombardment must cease.
sentences.cn: 当压强趋近于零时, 分子的碰撞就停止了.

sentences.en: Molecular diffusion also occurs in liquids and solids.
sentences.cn: 分子扩散同样也会在液体和固体中发生。

sentences.en: Molecular weights are expressed in the same units as atomic weights.
sentences.cn: 分子的重量和原子的重量用相同的单位表示.

sentences.en: Polymers consist of long molecular chains of covalently bonded atoms.
sentences.cn: 高聚物都是由共价链联接原子而形成的长链分子所组成.

sentences.en: Processes that consist of molecular changes are called chemical reactions.
sentences.cn: 包含分子变化的过程称作化学反应.

sentences.en: Some nebulae appear to be completely engulfed by exceedingly large molecular clouds.
sentences.cn: 有些气体星云似乎被极其巨大的分子云完全包围.

sentences.en: The best way to represent the isotactic structure is with molecular models.
sentences.cn: 表示等规结构的最好方法是用分子模型.

sentences.en: The faster protein has a molecular weight of 16.695.
sentences.cn: 快行的蛋白质分子量为16.695.

sentences.en: The past decade has witnessed an almost explosive growth of molecular radiobiology.
sentences.cn: 过去十年已经看到分子辐射生物迅猛发展.

sentences.en: The research will provide direct insight into molecular mechanisms.
sentences.cn: 这项研究将使人能够直接地了解分子的机理.

sentences.en: The transfer has been effected by a multitude of molecular collision.
sentences.cn: 这种转移是通过大量的分子碰撞而实现的.

sentences.en: This substance has now been cloned by molecular biologists.
sentences.cn: 该物质现在已被分子生物学家克隆。
